Html:
We regularly want to exchange snippets of TypeScript, but in a runnable environment with full compiler errors.

And a online storage with revision history (and edit user auth). So like JSFiddle but Better.

It probably would support some sort of virtual file system to test references, external modules and declaration files. So you could rig (and revise) demos and share them by url. Maybe comments etc.

The TS playground is very cool, but not quite what we're looking for (still a little limited).

Anyone aware of this?

Someone posted this on the forum some time ago:

http://typescript.io/

Cool, thanks. That is pretty good JSFiddle alternative.

Not seeing any compiler errors (in their original form) but I'll give it a spin.
